title: Samsung Galaxy M51 picks up stable One UI 4.1 update based on Android 12
content:
Samsungâ€™s One UI 4 rollout is moving ahead at a swift pace. At the start of this month, Samsung seeded stable One UI 4.1 updates to the Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62. In the following weeks, the company expanded the new update to a few more budget phones, including the Galaxy M31, Galaxy A32,

The post Samsung Galaxy M51 picks up stable One UI 4.1 update based on Android 12 appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the stable One UI 4.1 update based on Android 12 to the Galaxy M51. Read on.
